attributes.action: Let UKIP take control of the government until brexit has been sorted out.
attributes.additional_details: The evidence is all over the media.
attributes.background: The government obviously doesn't want to honour the brexit vote democracy doesn't exist in the house of common's.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. In any case, we can't accept petitions that are party political.

If you would like another general election, which UKIP would presumably participate in, you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
